data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Jeonbuk's Takahiro Kunimoto looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 1, Busan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Busan in the half of Jeonbuk.
Throw-in for Jeonbuk in their own half.
In the minute 3, Byung jin Park signals a free kick to Jeonbuk in their own half.
Jeonbuk drive upfield and Jo Gue-sung gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Busan defender.
Jeonbuk have been awarded a corner by Byung jin Park.
In the minute 5, Goal! Jeonbuk take a 1-0 lead through a well-placed header from Jo Gue-sung.
Kim Bo-kyung instrumental with a fine assist.
Free kick for Busan in their own half.
In the minute 6, Byung jin Park signals a Busan throw-in in Jeonbuk's half.
Free kick Busan.
Jeonbuk awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 10, Throw-in Jeonbuk.
Byung jin Park signals a free kick to Jeonbuk.
Jeonbuk push upfield and Choi Cheol-sun gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Busan defence.
In the minute 12, Jeonbuk are caught offside.
In Jeonju a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ball safe as Busan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 17, Takahiro Kunimoto for Jeonbuk drives towards goal at Jeonju World Cup Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Jeonbuk.
Throw-in for Busan at Jeonju World Cup Stadium.
In the minute 19, Romulo (Busan) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Busan.
Busan to take a throw-in in Jeonbuk territory.
In the minute 19, Byung jin Park awards Jeonbuk a goal kick.
Byung jin Park awards the away team a throw-in.
Busan needs to be cautious. Jeonbuk have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 22, Busan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Busan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Jeonbuk's half?
Kim Seung-jun of Busan smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 24, Busan's Jeong Seong-min is on target but unsuccessful.
Busan have been awarded a corner by Byung jin Park.
Corner awarded to Busan.
In the minute 26, Ball safe as Busan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Jeonju a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick for Jeonbuk in their own half.
In the minute 28, In Jeonju Jeonbuk's Choi Cheol-sun is caught offside.
Free kick Jeonbuk.
Park Jun-kang (Busan) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 31, Throw-in for Jeonbuk in the half of Busan.
Agony for Jeonbuk as Gustavo 's header comes back off the post and is cleared.
Jeonbuk pushes forward through Jo Gue-sung, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 32, Jeonbuk's Kim Bo-kyung gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Busan have a goal kick.
Jeonbuk drives forward and Kim Bo-kyung gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 34, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
An attacking Jeonbuk player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Jeonbuk are going well in Jeonju. They now lead 2-0 thanks to a Gustavo penalty.
In the minute 38, Byung jin Park signals a free kick to Busan in their own half.
Dostonbek Tursunov is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Dostonbek Tursunov has recovered and rejoins the match in Jeonju.
In the minute 42, Byung jin Park signals a free kick to Busan in their own half.
Jeonbuk's Gustavo has been booked in Jeonju.
Goal kick for Jeonbuk at Jeonju World Cup Stadium.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Jeonbuk in the half of Busan.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Busan awarded a free kick in their own half.
The first-half has come to a close in Jeonju.
Attention is being given to Jeonbukâ€™s Takahiro Kunimoto and play has been suspended briefly.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Duk-Jae Cho (Busan) is making a first substitution, with Kim Jung-hyun replacing Park Jong-woo.
Busan have been awarded a corner by Byung jin Park.
Byung jin Park signals a throw-in for Jeonbuk, close to Busan's area.
In the minute 49, Free kick for Busan in their own half.
Byung jin Park signals a Busan throw-in in Jeonbuk's half.
Busan make their second substitution with Kim Byong-oh replacing Kim Seung-jun.
In the minute 52, Byung jin Park signals a free kick to Jeonbuk.
Jeonbuk have been awarded a corner by Byung jin Park.
In Jeonju, Gustavo (Jeonbuk) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 54, It's a goal kick for the away team in Jeonju.
Ball goes out of play for a Busan goal kick.
Throw-in for Jeonbuk in their own half.
In the minute 58, Throw-in for Jeonbuk at Jeonju World Cup Stadium.
Jeonbuk drives forward and Kim Bo-kyung gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 59, Corner awarded to Jeonbuk.
The home team have replaced Gustavo with Modou Barrow. This is the first substitution made today by Jose Morais.
Busan have a goal kick.
Byung jin Park signals a free kick to Jeonbuk in their own half.
In the minute 64, Jeonbuk awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Busan in their own half.
Busan advance rapidly upfield but Byung jin Park blows for offside.
In the minute 66, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Jeonbuk.
Busan have been awarded a corner by Byung jin Park.
In the minute 68, Kwon Hyeok-kyu for Busan gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Jeonju.
Free kick for Jeonbuk in the half of Busan.
In the minute 69, Throw-in Busan.
Byung jin Park awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 71, Busan have a dangerous throw-in.
Duk-Jae Cho is making the team's third substitution at Jeonju World Cup Stadium with Gustavo Vintecinco replacing Jeong Seong-min.
Jeonbuk will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Busan.
Romulo (Busan) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 73, Goal kick for Jeonbuk at Jeonju World Cup Stadium.
Throw-in high up the field for Busan in Jeonju.
Busan awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 75, Free kick for Jeonbuk in their own half.
Lee Seung-ki is replacing Takahiro Kunimoto for the home team.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Jeonju to check on Yong Lee, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 77, Throw-in for Busan at Jeonju World Cup Stadium.
Can Jeonbuk get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Busan's half?
Yong Lee for Jeonbuk is back on the field again.
In the minute 79, Busan to take a throw-in in Jeonbuk territory.
Jeonbuk to take a throw-in in Busan territory.
Can Jeonbuk capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Busan's half?
Throw-in for Jeonbuk close to the penalty box.
Free kick Busan.
In the minute 80, The home team replace Han Kyo-won with Lee Dong-gook.
In the minute 80, Shin Hyung-min (Jeonbuk) has received a first yellow card.
Busan's Kim Jung-hyun gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Jeonbuk defender.
Busan have been awarded a corner by Byung jin Park.
In the minute 83, Busan are coming forward and Gustavo Vintecinco gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Byung jin Park awards Jeonbuk a goal kick.
Byung jin Park signals a Jeonbuk throw-in in Busan's half.
In the minute 85, Byung jin Park signals a free kick to Busan in their own half.
Byung jin Park signals a free kick to Busan.
Ball goes out of play for a Jeonbuk goal kick.
In the minute 87, Jeonbuk awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Jeonbuk get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Busan's half?
Throw-in Busan.
In the minute 89, Goal kick for Busan at Jeonju World Cup Stadium.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Byung jin Park signals a free kick to Jeonbuk in their own half.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Byung jin Park awards Jeonbuk a goal kick.
Throw-in for Jeonbuk in the half of Busan.
It's 2-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
